comment.author: Garret
comment.text: After reading a lot of these DNC staffers absolutely humiliating Bernie's manhood in the WikiLeaks today Just goes to show you Bernie would have been a hooker to this country. He's laying down to a women's campaign that is being schlonged by the biggest pervert of all time, Anthony Weiner. I have absolutely zero respect for him and any of his basement dwellers that hitched their ''revolution'' to a party and a criminal, that is nothing more then an un-American. If you are a real Bernie supporter you will write him in this election instead of living up to your basement like characteristics. You Bernie supporters have already been politically raped once, no need to be used as a one night stand twice

replies.author: Brittany
replies.text: Oh and about "wikileaks", some stupid internet blog. THe other day, multiple versions of the same emails appears. Ooops.

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Liberals love that the FBI is investigating Hillary Anna. Laws, especially Federal Law isn't important to them unless it benefits them in some way. Liberals are as mentally ill as Hillary Anna is. Hillary Anna is the next Hitler. If she somehow gets President by a rigged election, I and most Conservatives will not acknowledge her as President. We will actively seek to undermine and unite against her at every opportunity. I for one would hope the many states voting against her would Secede and make our own Republic so that we will not be a part of her Socialist Nation. Two separate nations would be better than having a Civil War. But I think Liberals are not intelligent enough to allow a peaceful separation. If Russia were to attack New England, I would applaud them and certainly not help those who have it coming with their depravity and lasciviousness way of living. Hillary Anna will certainly start a war with Russia. So, Liberals who hate America, vote for your Evil Dictator, vote for murdering babies, vote for Socialism. You will lose the better half of the nation if you do so.

replies.author: Nathan
replies.text: Oh could you be any more ridiculous.. Your socialist lost by 5 million votes and your hate of women is irrelevant. You want to throw your vote away and help elect the right wing fascist, because you really are this na√Øve, then best you remain irrelevant..
